display_long_description:
🩷The Potion or Poison Update is HERE!!💀
We've added a brand-new gadget to the game: the POTION!

Drinking the potion can be delicious, causing your head to shrink and making you harder to hit!

Or, it could be bitter, making your head grow bigger and creating a massive target for your enemies!
You'll never know which effect you’ll get until you take a sip!

Plus, we have the new Harrowed Heartshot Exclusive Mega Bundle! It’s packed with new Valentine's Day-themed items, including the "Heart Piercer" Crossbow Gun and a "Cupid's Cake" you can actually throw at your friends for hilarious effects!

Check out the new POTION gadget and the other Valentine's Day items now!

## 🎲Test Your Luck, Risk It All 🎲
Devil’s Roulette is a thrilling VR party game for 1-4 players, where you'll bravely pull the trigger of a pistol loaded with random live rounds. Every turn is a nerve-wracking gamble—will it fire, or will luck smile upon you?

## 🃏Change Your Fate with Powerful Items 🃏
Turn the tables using unique gadgets distributed each round! Enhance your reflexes with a bullet-dodging energy drink, stun your opponents with a modified taser, and much more. Outwit your friends to survive another turn!

## 😈Face the Ultimate Test of Courage😈
Laugh, scream, and sweat through this intense game of chance. Are you brave enough to pull the trigger, or will fate catch up to you? Gather your friends and experience the ultimate blend of suspense and hilarity in Devil’s Roulette!
